title: Wheres my mystery skin?????
body: I got riot kayle from a mysterybox, and i also got the poro icon gifted to me but why didnt i get a mystery skin? if someone could help me out that would be awesome

replies.body:
The mystery gift was only for those who already owned Riot Kayle prior to the anniversary event gifts going out. If you received both Riot Kayle and the poro icon, then you've received both gifts. See our [Official Announcement.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you)

Let me know if you have any questions.
